input_args.passage: "Giovanna d'Arco at Opera di Roma | The Opera di Roma opens its fall season this week with Giuseppe Verdi's rarely-performed early work, Giovanna d'Arco. The Teatro Costanzi was sold out on ..."
input_args.claim: "From the first source, we know that Giovanna d'Arco is an operatic dramma lirico with a prologue and three acts."
